802200.name: Hellbound: Survival Mode
802200.description:
THIS SURVIVAL MODE IS JUST A GLIMPSE OF THE FULL GAME. GET IT NOW!



Test your abilities in a fully-featured free survival mode! This provides a glimpse of the released campaign on August the 4th 2020! Follow the link above and get ready for the most intense ride to Hell since 1993!

Battle against hordes of demons and other unholy creatures in Hellbound, a First Person Shooter game inspired by the 90s’ classics like DOOM, Quake, Duke Nukem 3D, Blood, but with modern visuals and audio.

Power up and grab some BIG F**KING GUNS to try to beat all the unholy beasts in this GROTESQUE game focused on action, speed, gore, and metal music.
802200.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
